name: whispering lace summer headband
notes:
the whispering lace cotton crochet headband pattern is suitable for babies, toddlers, children, and women. this pattern offers a one-size-fits-all design and includes a step-by-step video tutorial for added convenience.

crafted from high-quality cotton, this headband pattern offers both style and comfort, making it the perfect accessory for any summer outfit. its versatile design allows you to create a headband that perfectly fits anyone from a tiny newborn to an adult.

whether you're a beginner or an expert, our easy-to-follow tutorial will guide you through the process, ensuring a flawless result. perfect for gifting, craft fairs, and party favors, this pattern is sure to impress.

don't miss out on this opportunity to showcase your creativity and create stunning headbands for yourself or your loved ones. get your hands on the whispering lace cotton crochet headband pattern today!

finished measurements

13 inches not including tie.
ties measure 12 inches at each end.

materials needed

25 grams of worsted weight cotton yarn.
i have used bernat handicrafter and loops & threads capri cotton for this.
note: you can use any worsted weight yarn it does not have to be cotton.
4.00 mm crochet hook
measuring tape
scissors
tapestry needle
